com.io7m.jcanephora.cursors

Class JCGLRGBA8UByteBuffered

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.io7m.jcanephora.cursors.JCGLRGBA8UByteBuffered
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JCGLRGBA8UReadableType, JCGLRGBA8UType, JCGLRGBA8UWritableType, com.io7m.jpra.runtime.java.JPRAValueType

    public final class JCGLRGBA8UByteBuffered
extends Object
implements JCGLRGBA8UType
    A ByteBuffer based implementation of the JCGLRGBA8U packed type.
